--- Nic <warriorazure@...> wrote:


> 
> Undisturbed, Azureblade takes to the air and charges his blast in the
> air so that the heat detonates the incoming rockets (or as many as
> possible) before they get to him. In the building momentum, he
> readies
> to attack the other Minion and aims his sword at the other's wings.

OOC: I am not sure if Asureblade's sword was just aiming at Animus'
wing or actually swinging at it. 

Bic:
Animus leaps into the skies with Azureblade, an almost eager smile
smile on his face. With a deft move he orients on Azureblade again as
he charges forward his blade swinging menecingly.

Preston
(Animus)
